name: Rachel Karchin
content: Karchin Lab KARCHIN LAB # # # COMPUTATIONAL ONCOLOGY IS CRITICAL FOR CANCER RESEARCH Technological advances have generated an abundance of complex, multi-layered datasets, which require new analysis methods and computational tools. OUR MISSION We develop computational methods to enable precision molecular analysis of cancers. Learn More CANCER RESEARCH IS NOW DATA SCIENCE We use AI and statistical models to interpret cancer genomes, tumor evolution, and the interactions of tumors and the immune system. WE COLLABORATE We believe in a multidisciplinary approach to cancer research. Learn More CANCER IS A SYSTEMS DISEASE Successful cancer therapies will target multiple biological pathways, with the immune system playing an important role.
